thread.title: PayGIS Selects Trevelino/Keller's Groovy Studios to Help Unveil New Offering, InkLynk
thread.title_full: PayGIS Selects Trevelino/Keller's Groovy Studios to Help Unveil New Offering, InkLynk

author: admin
title: PayGIS Selects Trevelino/Keller's Groovy Studios to Help Unveil New Offering, InkLynk
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/16/2015 @ 3:00 AM   Trevelino/Keller 
ATLANTA, Sept. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- PayGIS, a portfolio of world-class technology platforms, recently selected Trevelino/Keller and it's in-house creative team, Groovy Studios, to unveil the company's new offering, InkLynk, a public notice management platform. The agency was charged with establishing InkLynk's brand, messaging framework, web presence and launch lead generation efforts. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20130701/CL37548LOGO 
"Throughout our careers we have had the opportunity to work with a number of agencies, working with Trevelino/Keller has blown away past experiences. This team truly understands and delivers, quickly, based on our company's needs. The design quality and creativity has been impeccable," says Suzanne Lovelace, InkLynk CEO. 
InkLynk is a proprietary platform for legal professionals and publishers that provides users with a secure, trusted online marketplace, to easily buy, sell and manage legal ads as required by law. The platform uses cutting edge technologies to modernize public and legal notice ad processing therefore making all users more efficient and effective while tracking the steps, actions and documents necessary to produce legal evidence or handle periodic audits. 
"InkLynk's offering revolutionizes public notice processing for the legal industry by automating a procedure that has been manual for more than 200 years," explains Genna Keller, principal, Trevelino/Keller. "Partnering with PayGIS from the beginning has allowed us to provide our expertise throughout the pre-launch process and guide the brand and messaging development, which sets the stage for a successful and impactful launch." 
Recognized as one of the fastest growing firms in the United States, Trevelino/Keller is often sought after by companies in need of a strategic partner that cuts across public relations and digital marketing. 
About PayGIS, LLC PayGIS specializes in building exclusive, world-class technology platforms with a current focus on InkLynk, the only centralized platform used by both advertisers and publishers for efficiently managing and publishing public notices in any medium or market. Headquartered in Atlanta, the PayGIS executive team draws on decades of experience and expertise in information systems, transaction processing, credentialing, software and database development to deliver solutions across multiple business segments. For more information, visit http://www.paygis.com/ . 
About Trevelino/Keller Headquartered in Atlanta with a presence in San Francisco, Orlando, Fla., and Charleston, SC, Trevelino/Keller services emerging and established brands under the public relations and digital marketing banner. Ranked previously as the country's 4th fastest growing firm and a top 30 best places to work agency in North America, Trevelino/Keller is sought after by companies in Technology, B2Business, Lifestyle, GreenWorks, Food & Beverage and Health. 
Trevelino/Keller differentiates itself, in part, through its T/K Ventures initiatives which includes WheelhouseTK , an extended marketing services consortium; Atlas Alliance , a global network of partners based in Europe, Middle East, South America and Asia Pacific; Groovy Studios , a creative platform to serve startups and entrepreneurs; Consume Brands , a culinary arts, brand extension, product incubation and reputation management collaboration; and, StartOpia , an information ecosystem designed to expedite the search for startups, capitalists, experts and influencers. For more info on Trevelino/Keller, visit www.trevelinokeller.com . For a direct link to its ventures, visit www.wheelhousetk.com . 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/paygis-selects-trevelinokellers-groovy-studios-to-help-unveil-new-offering-inklynk-300141502.html 
SOURCE Trevelino/Keller
